rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BTW1201, BTW2121}

description: An introduction to the principles of the taxation of businesses, including an examination of: value-added tax (VAT); capital allowances; business income and expenses; sole traders; partnerships; companies and close corporations; credit agreements and township developers; trust income; capital gains tax; donations tax and administrative procedures.
